name: Sneak Attack (V)
Lore: 'Imperial training allows scouts to use speed and stealth to their advantage. On Endor, they were also backed up by Commander Igar''s ATSTs.',
Text: 'USED: If opponent just initiated a battle, place a card from hand on top of Reserve Deck.LOST: Add one battle destiny where you have an AT-ST, scout, or lone Imperial of ability < 4.',
